channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: @Penprince_ Proving again he‚Äôs twice the man of most of us.

@EladNehorai If it‚Äôs any comfort, @instagram cancelled my seldom used, very lame @BenYehudaPress account for reasons they won‚Äôt deign to tell me because 30 days have expired and we all know how hard document retention is.
@AkivaMCohen @TwitterSafety Meanwhile, here‚Äôs one they‚Äôre not suspending: https://t.co/7kWfznLhen

@dick_nixon Sir, I am sorry to say you were not loved by the eight year olds in my suburban private liberal Jewish school in advance of your re-election.
@dick_nixon And that was without any of us knowing the, shall we say, unseemly conversation you had on my eighth birthday which was 6/23/72. Kind of scars a ten-year-old‚Äôs faith in authority to learn how a president, even one he despised, obstructed justice on his eighth birthday.

Area rabbi defends AIPAC funding insurrectionists. Let me know if you find it convincing. https://t.co/kZbaZ3vhl0
Worth noting that for all his talk of supporting liberal causes, he does not seem to have submitted any op-eds to his local Jewish paper making the argument for BLM and the like.
This is the America Newt Gingrich built. https://t.co/SoNyk7iI8o
Seconded. https://t.co/o58NxX1IgM
What if Ayn Rand was actually a Communist agent sent to destroy America through her hyper capitalism? https://t.co/SahdBu4JHe

Finally, an anti-gun song from @DanBernHQ that‚Äôs not a tearjerker. https://t.co/TXVxFTVDu6
As opposed to this one, which is. https://t.co/FqYPpj6CFU
@RokhlK What is ZTK?
@DBashIdeas Which my one-time Zohar hevrusa @kavvanah of course read and passed on to me.
"This Old Man: Rough and Rowdy Days, Shadow Kingdom, and the 2022 Tour show Bob Dylan writing (and rewriting) for his elderly vocal range -- and perspective." Has anybody written this essay yet?
Your occasional reminder that AIPAC is helping elect the Republican congressmen who enabled this slaughter. https://t.co/k7NuLpBQqg
@DandiaAsad ‚ÄúOr you could be honest and say, ‚ÄòA Republican named Newt Gingrich saw a wedge issue and ran with it.‚Äô‚Äù
@c_o_bernstein Well, actually. https://t.co/v7N9NPp7x1
@swordsjew Sounds feline but ok.
@WatergateDayOf @SpiroAgnewGhost Shouldn‚Äôt there also be a Oval Office Day of account, tweeting out excerpts of that day‚Äôs transcripts?
@prof_goldberg Case name itself sounds like a hate crime.
